attributes.action: Cancel the 2019 parliamentary Summer recess. Sort the Brexit debacle instead!
attributes.additional_details: Given that party politics took precedence over national interest, regardless of which side of the fence one sits on this issue, MPs have a duty of care to keep on working towards a solution.
attributes.background: Parliamentary recess should be cancelled this Summer (2019) and MPs ought to keep on working towards a resolution to the Brexit debacle. Given the amount of money spent on the entire process, it is unfathomable how ineffective parliament has been at forging any workable solutions.
